backend/main.mo: Empty actor with no backend logic or persistence.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color variables and themes for the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry with root element and page title set to Valentine Interactive.
frontend/README.md: Developer guide explaining how to change the browser tab title by editing frontend/index.html.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps the ValentinePage component with a light-only ThemeProvider.
Animated floating image component with sway and blossom effects and load error handling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing copyright text and caffeine.ai attribution with a pulsing heart icon.
frontend/src/components/SparkleBurst.tsx: Creates an 8-sparkle radial burst animation at a given screen position.
frontend/src/components/SuccessModal.tsx: Success modal displaying a floral message with falling tulip and lily confetti animations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes a backend actor using the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder since no backend queries are required.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers plus extensive OKLCH variables for light/dark Valentine themes and custom utility classes/animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider, importing global styles.
frontend/src/pages/ValentinePage.tsx: Implements the animated Valentine interaction page with background loading, floating elements, music toggle, and Yes/No branching effects.
frontend/src/utils/assetDiagnostics.ts: Checks critical image assets by attempting to load them and logs successes or failures for deployment validation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color variables, animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, known issues, and feature-tracking state for the interactive Valentine flow.
